name: Dragon Breath
description: As you open your mouth with a roar, the deadly power of your draconic kin blasts forth to engulf your foes.
damage_type: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison
special: When you create your character, choose Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity as the ability score you use when making attack rolls with this power. You also choose the power’s damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. These two choices remain throughout your character’s life and do not change the power’s other effects.

name: Dwarven Resilience
description: You can use your second wind as a minor action instead of a standard action.

name: Elven Accuracy
description: With an instant of focus, you take careful aim at your foe and strike with the legendary accuracy of the elves.
effect: Reroll an attack roll. Use the second roll, even if it’s lower.

name: Fey Step
description: With a step, you vanish from one place and appear in another.

name: Second Chance
description: Luck and small size combine to work in your favor as you dodge your enemy’s attack.
effect: When an attack hits you, force an enemy to roll the attack again. The enemy uses the second roll, even if it’s lower.
